name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 2, in Handan, Hebei, after the property management of Yijing Lanwan Community was replaced, the new property management asked the owners to pay another property management fee. The owners refused to pay, so the property management stopped the community elevator and locked the community gate to prevent the owners from returning home. The owners shouted outside the gate: "We want to go home, long live the Communist Party" to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 31, Yongcheng, Shangqiu, Henan. A man filmed a 60-year-old man taking his four children on a bus alone.
After the video went viral, a blogger visited the old man's residence and found that the dilapidated house was full of garbage and rotten clothes inside and outside. His living conditions were worrying, and his mother did not appear.
In the comment area, some netizens said that they had seen the old man begging for a living.
Later, many people wanted to show their love, but the blogger said that he was very insignificant and the video had been removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 3, the fighting in northern Myanmar intensified, and Nansan Town, Zhenkang County, Yunnan was attacked by artillery shells, injuring 5 people.
After the incident, the national media reported it with the title "Foreign artillery shells fell into Yunnan", which triggered complaints from netizens. Netizens said that the word "fall" was used well, which can express that the artillery shells came from nowhere, and can also describe other people's inadvertent actions, and also explain our sentiment of tolerance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 2 a.m. on January 4, a long queue formed outside the Beijing State Bureau of Letters and Calls. Petitioners hoped to submit their petition materials before the bureau only accepted petitions for half a day on Thursday.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
One netizen added a picture of the queue area and security check room that one needs to go through to get to the National Bureau of Letters and Calls, as well as the entire process.
And reminded friends who plan to go to Beijing to petition, if you have gone to the National Bureau of Letters and Calls to petition, then forget about going to Tiananmen Square, because when you swipe your ID card during the security check, the machine will sound an alarm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, a blogger named "Hu Laoshi" posted a post questioning the deputy county magistrate of Gushi County, Henan Province, who took the lead in setting off fireworks.
On December 28, three police officers from Gushi County, Henan Province, went to Dongguan to summon him across provinces for "extortion".
On December 30, a blogger claimed that "Hu Laoshi" had been taken away by the Gushi County police.
It is reported that "Hu Laoshi" had previously posted many times to expose and report on land violations and environmental protection issues in Gushi County, Henan Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 3, in a residential area in Guangning County, Zhaoqing City, Guangdong Province, residents threw a large amount of RMB from the upper floors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
The police said that the money was scattered because of family matters that caused the residents to have a big emotional fluctuation. No one rushed to grab the scattered money, and all of it has been collected and returned to the person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of January 4, 2024, Liuzhou Road, Shanghai
Due to the bank's illegal early lending and different policies for the same project, the owners of Huiyue Court collectively protested and demanded that the interest rate be adjusted for the same project with the same policy. Afterwards, the A4 paper in the hands of the owners was confiscated by the police.
Then the people asked the Xuhui District Government to intervene, and then clashed with the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 3, Henan Radio and Television reported that a pharmacy in Zhoukou, Henan, forced its employees to sell expired drugs. If they could not sell them, they had to pay for it themselves. They worked for half a month in January, but did not earn a penny, and even had to pay 20 yuan.
After the incident was exposed, many netizens said in the comment area that they had the same experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 3, Xi'an, Shaanxi. An old man posted a video saying that his 15-year-old child Xie Changyang ran away from school in June 2022 and was found in a river more than four months later. When the body was found, only the torso was left, the head and limbs were missing, and the kidneys disappeared due to decay. He hoped that the local leaders could give the truth.
